page.title: 03HOUSING IN OUR AREA
page.content: A lot of our area is covered by hills, woodland and fields. Many of the new houses are less than twenty years old. The land they stand on was mainly farmland. Most of the houses are in estates called Ladywood, Greenlaw Mains one, Greenlaw Mains two, Kirkhill and Bellwood. There are also army houses belonging to Glencorse Barracks. The Council and Wimpey built many of these houses which are mostly semi-detached and terraced with a few detached houses. There are also some bungalows. The other houses in our area are mainly cottages or large farm houses like Auchendinny Mains. In addition there are a few very large old houses like Loganbank.
